review.title: “Excellent learning Experience with highly motivated and intelligent professionals.”
review.pros: Pros – Strong teamwork. Affable staff. Interesting projects. Overall exceptional experience.Creative problem solvers abound here. The company values seem spot on...a trait often missing in the corporate sector these days.
review.cons: Cons – Sometimes direction from above was lacking, might be due to the self-starter expectation. But this is a minor concern.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
